item.title: Celtic turn down Forest's £17m bid for Engels
item.description: Celtic reject a bid of about £17m from Nottingham Forest for Belgium midfielder Arne Engels.

item.title: Israel reopens Gaza's key Rafah border crossing with Egypt
item.description: Only dozens of Palestinians and no goods will be able to cross in both directions each day.

item.title: Fulham reject Everton's approach for Wilson
item.description: Fulham reject an offer from Everton for Harry Wilson, with the midfielder set to be out of contract this summer.

item.title: Bad Bunny makes Grammy history as stars protest against ICE
item.description: Other prizes went to Billie Eilish, Olivia Dean and Lady Gaga, at a ceremony dominated by politics.

item.title: Bencic & Svitolina make history with top-10 places
item.description: Belinda Bencic and Elina Svitolina become the first mothers to be ranked inside the world's top 10 at the same time.
